venue.name: Woburn Republican City Committee Fall Barbecue

item.description:
Promote Ron Paul at this Republican Party event north of Boston.

The Woburn Republican City Committee
Fall Barbecue is this Sunday, October 21,
from 1-4 PM at 36 Fletcher Rd, Woburn.
The weatherman is predicting great
weather - 70 degrees and sunny.
What better weather could we have to
meet with friends and candidates and
to learn from great speakers. I have
attached the flyer which includes directions.
Please RSVP as soon as possible. We
want to ensure everyone has a great
time. Thanks!
Helen
781-935-2899


Woburn Republican
City Committee Fall Barbecue

Join us for great food, great speakers and camaraderie

Date: Sunday, October 21st

Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM

Price: $15 per person
$25 per couple
children under 10 FREE!
NEW Location
36 Fletcher Road, Woburn, MA 01801
Directions: From the North take Rt 128/95S. From the South take Rt 128/95N. Take the Rt 38 exit and follow it North from the rotary. At the first set of lights turn right on to Alfred St. Turn left on Fletcher Rd. The Barbecue is at home number 36 Fletcher Rd.
Special Guests
US Senate Candidate
Jeff Beatty
MASSGOP Executive Director
Rob Willington
State Senate Candidate
Brion M. Cangiamila
State Committeewoman
Shari Worthington
State Committeeman
Bernie Green
Joe Manzoli

The Woburn Republican City Committee
welcomes the 2nd and 4th
Middlesex Senatorial Districts
and their guests

RSVP to: Helen Hatch
(781)935-2899
item.name: Woburn Republican City Committee Fall Barbecue
